Value.label: Delta Temperature change internal
Value.Help: Change between temperatures to trigger a temperature report (step 0.1) (Default 0 = disabled)

Value.label: Delta Temperature change external 2
Value.Help: Change between temperatures to trigger a temperature report (step 0.1) (Default 0 = disabled)

Value.label: Delta Temperature change external 3
Value.Help: Change between temperatures to trigger a temperature report (step 0.1) (Default 0 = disabled)

Value.label: Delta Temperature change external 4
Value.Help: Change between temperatures to trigger a temperature report (step 0.1) (Default 0 = disabled)

Value.label: Delta Temperature change external 5
Value.Help: Change between temperatures to trigger a temperature report (step 0.1) (Default 0 = disabled)

Value.label: Temperature reporting interval internal
Value.Help: Temperature reporting interval in minutes (Default 5 minutes)

Value.label: Temperature reporting interval external 2
Value.Help: Temperature reporting interval in minutes (Default 5 minutes)

Value.label: Temperature reporting interval external 3
Value.Help: Temperature reporting interval in minutes (Default 5 minutes)

Value.label: Temperature reporting interval external 4
Value.Help: Temperature reporting interval in minutes (Default 5 minutes)

Value.label: Temperature reporting interval external 5
Value.Help: Temperature reporting interval in minutes (Default 5 minutes)
